edge: Aamir Khan portrays the character Naik Laal Singh Chaddha, who is a part of the Parachute Regiment.
Kareena Kapoor Khan plays the character Rupa D'Souza Chaddha, who is Laal's wife and Aman's mother.
In this context, Hafsa Ashraf portrays the younger version of Kareena Kapoor Khan's character Rupa.
Naga Chaitanya plays the role of Naik Balaraju 'Bala' Bodi, who is Laal's army colleague and friend.
Mona Singh plays the character Gurpreet Kaur Chaddha, who is Laal's mother and Aman's grandmother.
Rohaan Singh portrays the character Aman Chaddha, who is Laal and Rupa's son and Gurpreet's grandson.
In this context, Manav Vij plays the character Muhammad Yakoob aka Muhammad Paji, who is a Pakistani army soldier and later befriends Laal.

node_2: woman passenger sitting in-front of laal in the train
edge: In this context, Aaryaa Sharma portrays a woman passenger who is seated in front of Laal on the train.

node_2: old sikh man on the train
edge: In this context, Arun Bali portrays an old Sikh man who is also travelling by train.

node_2: father, principal of the school laal studies in
edge: In this context, Jagat Rawat plays the character of the father of Laal and also a principal of the school where Laal is studying.

node_2: colonel suri, commanding officer, general hospital, leh
edge: In this context, Yuri Suri portrays the character of Colonel Suri who is also the commanding officer of the General Hospital located in Leh.

node_2: ramon chibb, laal's instructor in the parachute regiment training centre
edge: In this context, Dhananjay Singh Bundela plays the character of Ramon Chibb, who is Laal's instructor during his training period at the Parachute Regiment training Centre.
In this context, Gitikka Ganju Dhar portrays the character of Manjeet Kaur who is Laal's aunt.
In this context, Harry Parmar plays the role of Abbas Haji who is also Rupa's boyfriend.
In this context, Guneet Singh Sodhi portrays the character of Harry who is also Rupa's boyfriend.
In this context, Shiv Pandit plays the character of Naik Balaraju 'Bala' Bodi who is also a colleague of Laal.
In this context, Shah Rukh Khan portrays the character of Laal Singh Chaddha who is also known as Lalsaab.
In this context, Kareena Kapoor Khan portrays the character of Rupa who is also Laal Singh Chaddha's wife.
In this context, Deepak Dobriyal portrays the character of Govind who is also Laal Singh Chaddha's friend.
In this context, Asees Kaur portrays the character of Sarabjit Kaur who is also Laal Singh Chaddha's sister.
In this context, Ranjith portrays the character of Jarnail Singh Bhindranwale.
In this context, Anshuman Jha plays the character of Bhupinder Singh Babbar who is also a Punjab police officer.
In this context, Ranvir Shorey plays the character of Sadhu Sing who is also a Punjab police officer.
The director of this movie is Nishikant Kamat.
Laal Singh Chaddha is produced by Aamir Khan Productions.
